name: webchat
description: Browser chat application build on the UniverseAI Protocol

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* ./build && mkdir -p dist && npm run tsc && npm run build-script && npm run build-app
scripts.release: rm -rf ./relese/* ./build && mkdir -p relese && npm run tsc && npm run build-script && npm run build-app-release
scripts.build-app: webpack -c ./webpack.config.js && cp -r ./src/index.html ./src/favicon.ico ./src/gfx ./node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm ./node_modules/universeai/build/src/datamodel/decoder/signatureOffloader-worker-browser.js ./node_modules/universeai/build/src/storage/crdt/crdt-worker-browser.js ./dist/ && sed -i.bak "s/Decentralized Messaging/Decentralized Messaging ($(git rev-parse --short HEAD))/" dist/main.js
scripts.build-app-release: webpack -c ./webpack.config.release.js && cp -r ./src/index.html ./src/favicon.ico ./src/gfx ./node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm ./node_modules/universeai/build/src/datamodel/decoder/signatureOffloader-worker-browser.js ./node_modules/universeai/build/src/storage/crdt/crdt-worker-browser.js ./release/ && sed -i.bak "s/Decentralized Messaging/Decentralized Messaging ($(git rev-parse --short HEAD))/" release/main.js

author: The UniverseAI Foundation
